description:
* Based on a light novel from http://anidb.net/cr927 [Type-Moon]`s popular Fate/stay night franchise, written by http://anidb.net/cr43783 [Higashide Yuuichirou] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr48225 [Konoe Ototsugu].
There was once a Holy Grail War waged by seven Mages and Heroic Spirits in a town called Fuyuki. However, a http://anidb.net/ch89993 [certain Mage] took advantage of the chaos of World War II to steal the Holy Grail. Several decades have passed, and the Yggdmillennia family, who took upon the Holy Grail as its symbol, defected from the Mages` Association and declared their independence. Furious, the Association sent a force to deal with the Yggdmillennia, but they were defeated by the summoned Servants. With the Holy Grail War system changed, war with seven versus seven, breaks out. And so, the curtain rises on the epoch-making Great Holy Grail War.
Source: ANN
Note: The first two episodes received an advance airing on June 30, 2017. Regular TV airing started on July 2, 2017.

REGULAR.description:
Decades have passed since the Greater Grail was taken from Fuyuki. The Mage’s Association asks Kairi Sisigou to take part in the Great Holy Grail War.
Source: Netflix

Despite harboring doubts about her unusual summoning, Ruler heads to the battleground in Trifas, Romania, to preside over the Great Holy Grail War.
Source: Netflix

A young homunculus boy tries to escape after waking up inside a tank. Just as his strength gives out, Rider of Black appears.
Source: Netflix

Berserker of Red approaches the Black Faction stronghold. The Yggdmillennia clan and their Servants seize the opportunity to take action.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Der Preis ist das Leben, der Tod die Erlösung
Price of Life, Redemption of Death
Sei no Daishou, Shi no Tsugunai
生の代償, 死の償い

REGULAR.description:
Saber of Black vanishes after giving his heart to the young homunculus boy. Ruler swears to do everything in her power to grant him his freedom.
Source: Netflix

Believing a Servant could be behind the string of gruesome murders terrorizing Romania, the Mage`s Association sends in Kairi to investigate.
Source: Netflix

Fiore battles Sisigou after traveling to Sighișoara in pursuit of Assassin of Black. In the face of danger, a familiar figure rushes to her side.
Source: Netflix

The Great Holy Grail War enters a new phase as the Black and Red factions engage in an all-out conflict. Ruler and Sieg both head to the battlefield.
Source: Netflix

With the battles raging on, the Rider of Red learns who the Archer of Black is, forcing him to take on his former master.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Hyaku no Honoo to Hyaku no Hana
One Hundred Flames and One Hundred Flowers

REGULAR.description:
Sieg stands up to fight a formidable foe and protect his savior, the Rider of Black. Though weak, he`s soon joined by a hell-bent Berserker of Black.
Source: Netflix

The battle between the Lancers of Red and Black heats up, yet they remain gridlocked. Watching, Darnic hatches a plan to get what he wants.
Source: Netflix

Ruler and the Black Faction rush into the Sky Garden in chase of the Red Faction, who are now in possession of the Greater Grail.
Source: Netflix

Sieg admits that he can`t give up his desire to help his brethren, and the Rider of Black gives him his full support. Until Celenike shows up.
Source: Netflix

Despite Roche`s blind admiration for Avicebron, the Caster of Black reveals to Roche his deep-seated reasons for turning on the Black Faction.
Source: Netflix

To stop Shiro, acting head of the Yggdmillennia clan Fiore proposes a joint attack on the Hanging Garden with Sisigou and others.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Auch wenn unsere Wege sich trennen

REGULAR.description:
When the mysterious Jack the Ripper resurfaces to slaughter more magi, Fiore forms a plan to corner the killer.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: ジャック・ザ・リッパー

REGULAR.description:
While walking through town in hopes of luring out Jack the Ripper, Sieg and Jeanne observe the townspeople and discuss what it means to be human.
Source: Netflix

Pulled into Jack the Ripper`s nightmare filled with lost and abandoned children, Jeanne makes a fateful decision to lay the lost souls to rest.
Source: Netflix

The Hanging Garden is moving out of range, with the chance for a final battle swiftly approaching. Caules pushes Fiore to make a choice.
Source: Netflix

The Yggdmillennia alliance make their final preparations before setting out for the Hanging Garden. Jeanne reminds Sieg of the power that lies within him.
Source: Netflix

Chiron battles his former disciple, Achilles, in a bare-knuckle fight. As Astolfo and Sieg attack the Hanging Garden, Sieg makes a fateful decision.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: 天蠍一射[アンタレス・スナイプ]

REGULAR.description:
Mad with fury and unable to forgive Ruler for what she did to the Jack the Ripper children, Atalanta challenges her to a battle to the death.
Source: Netflix

A merciless attack by Semiramis leaves Kairi and Mordred heavily wounded. Shakespeare leads Jeanne down a painful journey into her past.
Source: Netflix

Shiro declares that he`s attained Third Magic and is now able to "save the world," but Jeanne firmly believes that he`s wrong in his beliefs.
Source: Netflix

Shiro and Semiramis make peace with themselves as their world crumbles around them. Young Sieg makes a shattering choice in an attempt to change fate.
Source: Netflix
